description: Two heavyweight contests set up another as the Euro 2024 semi-final in Munich on July 9 will see France and Spain meet. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: A tale of two players: Cristiano Ronaldo’s sad decline and Toni Kroos’ acclaimed exit
title_page: A tale of two players: Cristiano Ronaldo’s sad decline and Toni Kroos’ acclaimed exit | The Straits Times
maintext:
Two heavyweight contests set up another as the Euro 2024 semi-final in Munich on July 9 will see France and Spain meet.
The first two quarter-finals on July 5, one a classic, the other an exercise in attrition, saw hosts Germany and Portugal exit.
